app.about.title: I'm a
app.about.description: I am a full-stack React, TypeScript and Asp.net developer. I live in Ottawa, Canada. I love everything about the Web and Web Design. My ideal day consists of solving real problems, creating web pages from scratch, testing a new library, adding value, sharing my knowledge and learning something new. Check out my portfolio to see some of my projects.
